description: This data set includes all the tourist destinations that are part of the Path Through History program.  These sites are tourism destinations that are aligned with at least one the 13 themes; Arts & Culture, Canals & Transportation, Civil Rights, Colonial History, Immigration, Innovation and Commerce,  Native Americans, Natural History, Revolutionary War, Sports History, U.S. Presidents, War of 1812 and Women’s Rights.  Nearly 600 sites throughout the state are included.

name: Path Through History Program Sites
